title: NC Toe Warmers with Adhesive, Instant Air Activated Shoe Boot Provide Long Lasting Warmth for Skiing, Outdoor Activities, Disposable Heat Packs Foot Women Men - 12 Pairs Value Pack, white
features: NATURAL & LONG-LASTING HEAT - Toe warmer is made of soft and breathable non-woven fabric outer with eco-friendly iron ingredients, air activated, provide warmth up to 8 hours. Quick & long-lasting heat, uniform heating.

EASY TO USE - Remove warmer from outer package, fully air activated, warmer heats up in 3-5 minutes, tear the paper backing out, and stick warmers in your gloves, boots, pants, coats or mitts indoor or outdoor. If heat decreases, expose warmer to air to reactivated until the warmer useless.

WINTER OUTDOOR ESSENTIAL - Warmers are weightless and portable to take with your snow mobile trip, dog walking, skiing, hunting or outdoor games. Ideal to prevent winter outdoor worker from frostbite in chill winter.
SAFE & DURABLE - 1 pair per pack, 12 packs in all, toe warmer is ultra thin and has a rounded toe, perfect for optimal comfort in boots and shoes. Convenient, compact, odorless, non-toxic.

NOTICE - Do not apply heating warmer directly to the skin. If feel too hot, do not continue to use it to prevent cryogenic burns. Do not apply warmer with any heating source. Store it in the dry but no direct sunshine.
